guidanceItem.title: Untrusted Output is Not Directly Echoed Back to the User
guidanceItem.content:
What to Check For

Ensure that your application does not echo the input back to the user without first validating and/or encoding the data.

Why

Echoing input directly back to the user makes your application susceptible to malicious input attacks, such as cross-site scripting.

Related Guideline

  • Do Not Echo Untrusted Data Back to the User

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
